ProductInfo.Features:
This TV can be paired with LG's fun and intuitive Magic Remote (not included, AN-MR400) that lets you easily select features on your TV with the wave of your hand, the scroll of a wheel or use LG's unique Voice Mate that is capable of recognizing how you naturally speak to change channel, volume or find something to watch
Get rid of multiple remote controls. Your LG Magic Remote (not included) can control your Blu-ray, HTiB, Set-Top-Box and sound bar so you don't have to search for the right remote for each of your different media devices
Access premium content providers like Hulu Plus, Netflix and YouTube direct from your TV. Now you get your favorite movies, TV shows, gaming, apps and more. LG connects you to the content that you and your family want
LG gives you multiple ways to share your photos from your vacation, video from your child's recital or your favorite song to your TV from a compatible device
You won't believe your eyes: LG's LED technology delivers amazing brightness, clarity and color detail
ProductInfo.Name: LG 55LN5700 55" 1080p TV, Smart, 120Hz, Dual Core, Direct LED TV - Bundle - with Sanus Systems ELM202 6-Outlet Surge Protector, Xtreme Cables HDMI 1.4 Audio/Video 6' Cable for 3D HDTV, & Xtreme Cables 200ml HDTV Deluxe Cleaning Kit
